body_html:
Attempted to build on windows using CUDA 9 & VS 2017.
The first error was related to "NVTOOLEXT_HOME" being none, the script did however manage to detect CUDA.
The second error was related to cmake not detecting the C & CXX compilers, resulting in unknown. This was after running setup.py from the Command Prompt for VS 2017

The first error was related to "NVTOOLEXT_HOME" being none, the script did however manage to detect CUDA.
The second error was related to cmake not detecting the C & CXX compilers, resulting in unknown. This was after running setup.py from the Command Prompt for VS 2017
body:
Attempted to build on windows using CUDA 9 & VS 2017.
The first error was related to "NVTOOLEXT_HOME" being none, the script did however manage to detect CUDA.
The second error was related to cmake not detecting the C & CXX compilers, resulting in unknown. This was after running setup.py from the Command Prompt for VS 2017
